channel.title: admin on Simon Kapitza
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Simon Kapitza

item.description: I?m a PhD Candidate at the Quantitative & Applied Ecology Group, a diverse and dynamic ecological modelling group at the University of Melbourne. I also work as a research assistant at the new Macroecology Lab at Uni Potsdam (Germany). I am an interdisciplinary ecological modeller developing methods for integrated assessments of biodiversity change��. My particular interest is in understanding and integrating socio-economic drivers of biodiversity change. I am experienced in developing land-use and biodiversity models and coupling these with economic models into integrated assessment frameworks.
